creator: adrian.bala@gmail.com
text:
Author: Jacek Czerski
Task added by: Adrian Bala

Would be very nice to double click the element in Results Tree Listener and be moved to its instance in Test Plan tree. For now it is quite inconvenient especially with many similar called and described http requests in the test plan.
I like this idea, maybe a right-click -> "see in results tree" (and vice versa) instead of double click to prevent confusion if you accidentally double click.
creator: graham@ham1.co.uk
